data.title: Creed My Own Prison - 25th Anniversary Edition - Sealed US Vinyl LP
data.meta_description: CREED My Own Prison (25th Anniversary Edition 10-track LP, their smash hit multi-platinum breakthrough debut album originally released in 1997 and available now for the first time on black vinyl. Featuring four Billboard Hot Mainstream Rock #1 singles - My Own Prison, Torn, What's This Life For and One. Picture sleeve with hype sticker, factory sealed. Recommended) Tracklisting & Info: My Own Prison was Creed’s debut album, celebrating its 25th anniversary this year. Originally released in 1997, it was the album that catapulted the band to stardom and has gone on to sell over 15 million copies worldwide and is certified 6x platinum. The album features the hit singles “My Own Prison,” “Torn,” “What’s This Life For”, and “One”. These songs saw the band dominate the US airwaves for years to come. “(My Own Prison) will always have a special place in my heart because it changed my life forever and launched my life and career in the music business.”- Scott Stapp. Side A 1. Torn 2. Ode 3. My Own Prison 4. Pity For A Dime 5. In America Side B 1. Illusion 2. Unforgiven 3. Sister 4. What's This Life For 5. One Year of Release - 2022 Format - vinyl LP album (LP record) Record Label - Craft Recordings Catalogue No - CR00495 Country of Origin - USA Barcode - 888072441194 Availability - In Stock

CREED My Own Prison (25th Anniversary Edition 10-track LP, their smash hit multi-platinum breakthrough debut album originally released in 1997 and available now for the first time on black vinyl. Featuring four Billboard Hot Mainstream Rock #1 singles - My Own Prison, Torn, What's This Life For and One. Picture sleeve with hype sticker, factory sealed. Recommended)

TRACKLISTING AND EXTRA INFORMATION

My Own Prison was Creed’s debut album, celebrating its 25th anniversary this year. Originally released in 1997, it was the album that catapulted the band to stardom and has gone on to sell over 15 million copies worldwide and is certified 6x platinum. The album features the hit singles “My Own Prison,” “Torn,” “What’s This Life For”, and “One”. These songs saw the band dominate the US airwaves for years to come. “(My Own Prison) will always have a special place in my heart because it changed my life forever and launched my life and career in the music business.”- Scott Stapp.

Side A

1. Torn

2. Ode

3. My Own Prison

4. Pity For A Dime

5. In America

Side B

1. Illusion

2. Unforgiven

3. Sister

4. What's This Life For

5. One
